definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides

sentences.english: This disease was often agnostic and misdiagnosed biliary ascariasis in the past.
sentences.chinese: 過去對本病缺乏認識，常誤診爲膽道蛔蟲病。

sentences.english: This is a ball of Ascaris lumbricoides worms removed from the colon of an adult.
sentences.chinese: 成年人結腸取出的蛔蟲團，爲重度感染。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the effect of the treatment of biliary ascarid with duodenoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討十二指腸鏡治療膽道蛔蟲病的效果。

sentences.english: Possible culprits included ticks, roundworms and certain microbes.
sentences.chinese: 可能的病原包括蜱，蛔蟲和特定的微生物。

sentences.english: RMG integrates this information and sends signals to the worm’s muscles.
sentences.chinese: RMG集成信息並對蛔蟲肌肉發出信號。

sentences.english: A worm, especially a parasitic roundworm_or_tapeworm.
sentences.chinese: 一種蠕蟲，尤指寄生蛔蟲或絛蟲。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of endoscopy in the diagnosis of biliary tract roundworm disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討採用內鏡診斷膽道蛔蟲病的價值。

sentences.english: Like most worms, helminths synthesize chitin for their pharynx.
sentences.chinese: 如同大多數蠕蟲，蛔蟲爲自身咽部合成甲殼素。

sentences.english: It indicated that milbemycin oxime could make infectious Toxocara eggs lose its infection.
sentences.chinese: 結論米爾貝肟可使感染性犬蛔蟲卵失去感染性。
餘下的就是蛔蟲的研究。

sentences.english: But worms have another kind of connection.
sentences.chinese: 但蛔蟲有另外一種連接方式。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of ascaris intestinal obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了提高蛔蟲性腸梗阻的診治水平。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the clinical value of endoscopic treatment of biliary ascariasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內鏡治療膽道蛔蟲病的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: I Without you, there is no such hurt my stomach worms crawling in the intestines.
sentences.chinese: 我要是沒有你，就有如鬧肚子沒有蛔蟲在腸子裏爬。

sentences.english: The problem of control of the ascariasis was briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 根據實驗結果，對豬蛔蟲病的防治問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: Roundworm is rare in developed countries such as the UK.
sentences.chinese: 蛔蟲是罕見的在發達國家，如英國。

definition: to choke on (food etc)/to swallow the wrong way
lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what/fig. not getting to any matter of substance/scratching the surface/superficial/perfunctory
